metadata.title: CVE-2019-10691 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The JSON encoder in Dovecot before 2.3.5.2 allows attackers to repeatedlycrash the authentication service by attempting to authenticate with aninvalid UTF-8 sequence as the username.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10691` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dovecot-core - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
dovecot-gssapi - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
dovecot-imapd - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
dovecot-ldap - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
dovecot-lmtpd - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
dovecot-managesieved - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
dovecot-mysql - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
dovecot-pgsql - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
dovecot-pop3d - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
dovecot-sieve - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
dovecot-solr - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
dovecot-sqlite - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
mail-stack-delivery - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dovecot package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.3').
